summary: "The Batman" is a 2022 superhero movie based on the DC Comics character. Directed by Matt Reeves, it stars Robert Pattinson as Bruce Wayne/Batman. The film shows Batman fighting crime in Gotham City and uncovering corruption linked to his family. He also pursues the Riddler, a serial killer targeting the city's rich. Development started in 2013, and filming began in 2020. The movie was released in 2022 and was a big hit, making a lot of money at the box office. It got good reviews from critics and won several awards. The film is part of a new Batman shared universe, with sequels and spin-offs planned.
title: The Batman (film)
